name: Corrupted Beats
description:
Survive the onslaught of the corrupted beats manifesting from the music pulsing around you as you progress through the levels and grow your power!

Explore procedural generated levels each with their own music playing controling the intensity of the situation the faster and heavier the music the more powerful enemies will become but so will you, destroy the various corrupted beats with special talents and abilities and test your skills to see how long you can survive!

If you've conquered all the existing songs you can also add your own music as mod support for the enemies to react to in game for endless replayability.

  • Earn Coins by annihilating the corrupted beats around you.
  • Buy Equipment to enhance your characters Stats.
  • Survive Endless Waves of enemies powered from the music pulsing around them.
  • Upgrade your character by completing stages to permanently buff stats and unlock new weapons.
  • Customize your character with different colours and skins coming soon!
Controls

Move: WASD
Aim: Move Mouse
Open Game Menu: ESC

Minimum Specs
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Memory: 4GB RAM
  • Storage: 300MB
Other Notes / Warnings
  • This Game is in early alpha and everything is subject to change and does not represent the final product. In its current stage please think of it as a demo rather than a full game.
  • This Game contains heavy flashing lights.
  • Do Not distribute the game or claim it as your own, all versions must come from officially distributed links.
Links
